name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: time on web - 网站访问时长统计管理工具

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your all-in-one tool to monitor website activity, manage time efficiently, and stay laser-focused

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time On Web: Master Your Browsing Time, Boost Productivity 🚀
Overview:

Time On Web helps you take control of your online habits and boost productivity. By tracking your browsing activity, setting limits, and offering insights, it empowers you to stay focused and manage your time more effectively.

Key Features:
1. Comprehensive Activity Insights 📊：Get detailed charts and analytics to understand how you spend your time online.
2. Custom Website Time Limits ⏳：Set time limits for specific sites to manage screen time and avoid distractions.
3. Customizable Whitelist for Untracked Sites 📝：Exclude specific websites from tracking to focus on what matters most.
4. Focus Mode 🔒：Block distracting websites during work or study sessions to stay on task.
5. Privacy Focused 🔐：Your data is private and secure, with no third-party tracking.
